channel.title: Ann-Marie McGregor on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Ann-Marie McGregor on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: World Dementia Awareness Month 2014
item.description: MD - Michelle Drumm YS - Yvonne Stewart AMMD - Anne Marie MacDonald AL - Anne Love RB - Rosalyn Barclay AMMG - Ann-Marie McGregor MD September is World Dementia Awareness Month, and to mark it, Iriss.fm met up with the directors of Dementia Scotland Consultancy and Training and a group of carers and professionals in the area of dementia care. We firstly spoke to Yvonne Stewart and Anne Marie MacDonald about Dementia Scotland Consultancy and Training.
